idea:
Snow In A Bowl is not just a brand or a company, it's a CONCEPT.


We come with a Main-Course that tastes like a Dessert.


It's specifically designed for everyone under the sun, of every age-group and serves as a lovely nutritious treat for children, a great travel diet for business professionals and also as the perfect wholesome breakfast and pre-workout add on. 


It can be your ideal morning breakfast on a day that you must eat lighter and require a greater yield of energy. 


It can also serve as an awesome flight meal.


We look to LIQUIDATE your complex carbs and then SNOWFLAKE them, giving you a power packed meal in an easy to consume melt-in-the-mouth form of SNOW.



Snow In A Bowl is the ONLY DESSERT  

you can consume for ALL your meals

and get fitter and feel healthier  

with NO guilt.


Welcome to the SNOW DIET.
name: Snow In A Bowl

idea:
ACADZA: Solving the hand-holding problem in EdTech - with a technological disruption.


The increase in adoption of online platforms and worsening teacher-student ratio in offline ones is further amplifying the need of hand-holding every day. A scalable, personalised, cost friendly solution is need of the hour. ACADZA does exactly that using big data, AI, and ML.


ACADZA is a self-study buddy offering a full-suite solution including all that incumbents do + hand-holding. Incumbents will have to rebuild their platforms from grounds-up to achieve this.


Founded by Anshul Singhal, a JEE coaching veteran, ACADZA has completed the MVP and a stunning product-market fit demonstration. Anshul has invested ~INR 1.75 Crore (~USD 230K) of personal funds to achieve this. The company is now raising the seed round.
name: ACADZA TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
M/s SKANCORP Gas Technologies Pvt Ltd (SKANCORP Gas), is getting ready to introduce its CNG Car Dispensers (Single and Twin arm). 

SKANCORP Gas is located in Thane, Maharashtra with its plant with an initial capacity of around 250-300 dispensers annually. SKANCORP Gas is committed to produce world class, safe and reliable CNG dispensers to complement the leading developers of CGD business in India. The technical team is handpicked, possess product specific experience and well versed with the CNG dispensers.

Further SKANCORP Gas is equipped to provide maintenance services all over designated GAs across India
name: SKANCORP GAS TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The concept is totally modern and we are making the vision of our company very clear that we want to provide the fuel to every needy person who is not able to go to the fuel pump for refueling their vehicles. We want to provide diesel to the consumers to their place. Make the world stop doing outdated things and bring them the new concept of diesel delivery to increase work efficiency and reduce the human effort.
name: GNEXTERA ENERGY LLP
